<js>
//取正文
a=org.jsoup.Jsoup.parse(String(result).match(/id="[A-Z].*?">([\s\S]*?)\s<\/div>/)[1]).html();
//取屏蔽段落
var content=String(result.match(/function\s*getDecode\(\)\{(.*)\}/)[1]);
//还原屏蔽段落
content=content.replace(/\\/g,"/")
.replace(/[A-Z]=~.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/#.*?\('/g,"")
.replace(/'\).*/g,"")
.replace(/\+|"/g,"")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$__\$/g,"9")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$___/g,"8")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$\$/g,"7")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.\$\$_/g,"6")

.replace(/[A-Z]\._\$_/g,"2")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.__\$/g,"1")
.replace(/[A-Z]\.___/g,"0")
.replace(/\/\/74\/{2,3}160\/\/76/g,"\n")
//大写字母
.replace(/\/\/132/g,"Z")
.replace(/\/\/131/g,"Y")
.replace(/\/\/130/g,"X")
.replace(/\/\/127/g,"W")
.replace(/\/\/126/g,"V")

.replace(/\/\/121/g,"Q")
.replace(/\/\/120/g,"P")
.replace(/\/\/117/g,"O")
.replace(/\/\/116/g,"N")
.replace(/\/\/115/g,"M")
.replace(/\/\/114/g,"L")

var bookCount=2,searchList=[];
importClass(org.jsoup.Jsoup);
for(var i=1;i<=bookCount;i++){
var url='http://www.13to.com'+
Jsoup.parse(result).select(".article:eq("+i+") h2 a").attr("href");
var doc=Jsoup.parse(java.ajax(url));
var name=doc.select("[property=og:novel:book_name]").attr("content");
var author=doc.select(".zz a").text();
var tag=doc.select(".nif").text().split(' ')[0]+','+doc.select(".catb").text().split(' ').join(',');
var last=doc.select(".zjlist:eq(2) li:eq(0)").text();
var intro=doc.select(".docspt p").html();
var cover=doc.select("[property=og:image]").attr("content");
searchList.push({
name:name,
author:author,
tag:tag,
last:last,
intro:intro,
cover:cover,
url:url
})
}
searchList

ruleFindUrl:
<js>
/**
自定义数组 n 中的数字，加载1份或多份书单。
1到5，分别对应5大类书单。即，"所有"、"最新"、"精品"、"男频"、"女频"；
从6开始，则精选了几位书单大佬的书单集，分别是：
6、优书优选；
7、风萤月；
8、赤戟；
9、己未癸酉；
10、天落歌；
11、青山；
12、山猫；
13、厂长
**/
n=[1,7];
m1=["全部","新","精","男频","女频","优选","风萤月","赤戟","己未","天落歌","青山","山猫","厂长"];
m2=["all","newest","essence","man","women",788682,756653,333316,888741,402302,698727,27857,560124];
u1="::/booklist/";
u2="?page=searchPage&&";
w1="http://img.yousuu.com/booklists?page=1&type=";
w2="http://img.yousuu.com/user/";
w3="/booklistDetail?page=1";
result="";
function wy (n){
n<6?www=w1+m2[n-1]:www=w2+m2[n-1]+w3;
tmp=java.ajax(www);
blist=JSON.parse(tmp).data.booklists.map(a=>"["+m1[n-1]+"] "+a.title.replace(/[^ 0-9a-zA-Z\u4e00-\u9fa5]/g,"")+u1+a.booklistId+u2).join("");return blist}
for (i in n){result+=wy(n[i])}
</js>

ruleBookContent:
<js>
id=result.match(/article_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
cid=result.match(/chapter_id = "(\d+)"/)[1];
hash=result.match(/hash = "([\d\w]+)"/)[1];
tmp="http://x.23yue.cn/home/index/ajaxchapter@id="+id+"&eKey="+hash+"&cid="+cid+"&basecid="+cid;
result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(tmp)).info.content
result=result.replace(/一秒记住【残月.*?弹窗免费阅读！/g,"").replace(/＞＞/g,"").replace(/本章未完.*?继续阅读/g,"").replace(/一秒记住【残月.*?告免费读，残月QQ\d*/g,"")
</js>

result=JSON.parse(java.ajax(tmp)).info.content
